attributes.action: Postal Voting experiment has failed - scrap it
attributes.additional_details:
Many Cases of Electoral Fraud have been exposed and summarised by the excellent documentary on BBC
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b03xf0gt
attributes.background:
Since it's inception Postal Voting has been misused & abused. How  much longer should this continue ? Postal Voting in its present form is not fit for purpose and voting should revert to identified & verified personal voting at polling stations.
Albert Meehan
